Package org.genthz.dsl

Interface Strictable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Dsl
All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomOps, DashaDsl
public interface Strictable
This class contains methods that make it possible to create context selectors based on the type of object being created (i.e. InstanceContext.type()).
Since:
3.0.0
Author:
mathter

  • Method Details

    • s

      default <T, S extends Pathable & Customable & InstanceBuilderFirst<T> & FillerFirst<T> & Metric<S> & Using<S>> S s(Type type, Type... genericTypeArgs)
      The method is short alias for strict(Type, Type...) )}.

    • strict

      <T, S extends Pathable & Customable & InstanceBuilderFirst<T> & FillerFirst<T> & Metric<S> & Using<S>> S strict(Type type, Type... genericTypeArgs)
      Method returns object for building selector chain with class check element. The selector that will be created uses the Object.equals(Object) method to test the context. 
            Dsl dsl = new DashaDsl()
          .defs()                                     // create default rules for object creation.
          .strict(String.class)                       // matche only String.class
          .simple(ctx -> "This is a test string");    // create instance builder with fixed generated value: "This is a test string"
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of the path element.
      S - type of the selector builder.
      Parameters:
      type - type of the path element.
      genericTypeArgs - types of type parameters array.
      Returns:
      selector buider.

    • strict

      default <T, S extends Pathable & Customable & InstanceBuilderFirst<T> & FillerFirst<T> & Metric<S> & Using<S>> S strict(Class<T> clazz, Type... genericTypeArgs)
      Like strict(Type, Type...) but first parameter has Class type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of the path element.
      S - type of the selector builder.
      Parameters:
      clazz - class of the path element.
      genericTypeArgs - types of type parameters array.
      Returns:
      selector builder.
